summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 18%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (up 7 mbar), light levels (up 6591 lux), and cloud levels (up 594 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 5041 lux), cloud levels (up 283 m), and feels like temperature (down 2.2°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; hot temperatures throughout the day. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and light winds will prevail. Chance of light rain, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
